website_summaries.verdict: A simple deer call that's great for beginners at an unbeatable price.
pros: Has a good sound and includes a flexible tube that allows you to direct sound
The cost is very budget friendly
cons: You might want to consider putting this call on a different string
The lanyard that comes with it is not very strong

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT BUCGRUNTER
customer_reviews.text: Hello I gave 4 star because string that comes with this Idem. I was 17 feet high on the tree And all of a sudden I heard like metal noise, I saw on my neck my Buck Grunter is missing. I said I will not go back down to get it. I know in my bag I also have Arrow head Knight & Hale to use. I said next time I do not trust that string. I hope this will help who wants to buy this BucGrunter. Thank you Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Celalettin Akarcay. Prime Customer.

customer_reviews.title: Call quality matches price
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. This is as quality call as I’d anticipate for the money. As someone who hunts half of open season, I wish I would’ve invested in a little higher quality. However, if you’re not hunting but one or twice a week, this would be a decent call. It gets the job down.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: NO O-RING
customer_reviews.text: Call sounded good but was kind of deep sounding for younger bucks. Went to check the o-ring to see if I can adjust the sound and the o ring wasn’t there. It has the notches for mature buck young deer and doe grunts but with no o ring it’s always on mature buck. Had to steal one off my old call to make it work. Seen other reviews of same issue
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It will do, if you don’t want to spend big dollars
customer_reviews.text: I guess it works, sound ok, comes apart a bit to easy. I decided to tape the tube on, which helped. It will probably do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: merteleizer

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: the deer raise their head and come running. love this grunt call
customer_reviews.author: Stonefree

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Loud. Works like a charm. Perfect for the hunter in your life. Small enough to put in pocket or backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Mize

customer_reviews.title: Works fine.
customer_reviews.text: This is a low cost grunt call that works and sounds the way I imagined. It sounds good. No frills. The lanyard is worthless though. Has a sliding knot that cinches up to the call. Obviously it slides down as easily as it slides up. Better off not including junk, just because they can. The actual call works fine, just keep it in your pocket, or use a different lanyard.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Kurschat

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $$$
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great. Just wish the tube would stay on the body a little better.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Podlasek

customer_reviews.title: Decent value
customer_reviews.text: Fell apart in shipping and didn’t have instructions on what way to reassemble.. I think I figured it out though
customer_reviews.author: Kyle B

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Worth the price for the lanyard and extra parts. It is a ok call.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Call fell apart first time using it.  Came out with only half of unit.
customer_reviews.text: Used it for the first time last weekend, arrived back at truck and only had top half of the call with me, the bottom half fell off in woods somewhere.
customer_reviews.author: John L.

customer_reviews.title: I tried it the other night and called in a ...
customer_reviews.text: I tried it the other night and called in a doe ! It was the call or the bug spray I had on !!
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Get another brand
customer_reviews.text: Did not have a band on the reed. Sounds like crap!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy something else
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with no oring and couldn’t use the call. Used one off another call and none of the tones resembled deer in my opinion. Primos calls are definitely better.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Best call u can buy
customer_reviews.text: Got 3 deer in 1 because this thing brings the deer
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Missing the ring
customer_reviews.text: It’s missing the ring to adjust the different call sounds
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was late, product was incomplete, missing parts made item useless.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great product and good price
customer_reviews.text: My son uses this when hunting. It was exactly as described and shipped fast.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Jones

customer_reviews.title: Here comes a buck!
customer_reviews.text: The first day I tried this call a very nice whitetail buck arrived! The buck even turned back around towards me with a second call after beginning to leave upon seeing me. I was also using a doe bleat call. Worked great! He is now feeding my husband & I.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for a friend and he says it's the best he's ever used. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Truthsong

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: worked well but the neck strap kept coming off had to tape it to get it to stay but other than that it is a great product
customer_reviews.author: kenny

customer_reviews.title: What I was looking for at a good value!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't scored a buck with it yet, but it works fine!
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Cheap product
customer_reviews.text: Cheap quality. Tube fell off and is lost in the woods somewhere. Now it's useless.
customer_reviews.author: Claire D Swauger

customer_reviews.title: It is a great item. I needed to return since my husband ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a great item. I needed to return since my husband received another one of them. Company so easy to work with. Would definitely buy from them again!
customer_reviews.author: Christie B.

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: It didn't have the rubber band for changing the sound.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: it looks good now now will see if it brings that big old buck in .
customer_reviews.author: ted grugel

customer_reviews.title: Missing O-Ring
customer_reviews.text: The call was missing the O-Ring that was supposed to be in it to change tones. They obviously forgot something.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: It sounds well. Having got a deer yet with it. Hopefully I will then I can buy more of there products
customer_reviews.author: letting it download . hope it's good

product_meta.title: Hunter's Specialties Bucgrunter Deer Call
feature_bullets: Flexible ribbed tube channels sound in any direction, producing realistic, deep gutteral grunts
Tone can also be changed by cupping hand over the end
Easily produces tending, threatening and reassuring grunts to bring the bucks closer
